name: 陳政翰
objective:
本門課程將以基礎軟體應用與提升實務能力為主，透過 Adobe Photoshop、 Illustrator 以及配合現代科技 GAI 的發展，帶領同學學習如何利用製作影像來表達或呈現自己的想法，訓練軟體操作能力，培養設計美感。
The course will focus on fundamental software applications and enhance practical skills. Students will learn how to create images to express and present their ideas through the use of Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator and the integration of modern technology like Generative AI (GAI). This course aims to develop software proficiency and cultivate a sense of design aesthetics.
